author: Scott Rosenberg
title: The threats to Big Tech in a post-virus world - Axios
description: The tech giants are more essential than ever, but face a new set of potential challenges.
content:
Big Tech's newly bolstered dominance doesn't make these companies invulnerable. 
The big picture: Three elements form the ground on which the tech giants built their success cheap hardware, connectable software and the freedom to innovate. Each of these foun… [+2047 chars]
